| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |

## Events

| Event    | Description                                             | Type               |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `closed` | Event fired when the `side-sheet` has finished closing. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `opened` | Event fired when the `side-sheet` has finished opening. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
